dialogStrings:
“Mmm?
I'm not going to the parade.”{PAUSE}“The road to becoming SOLDIER
First Class is very difficult.”

“Don't mind me.”{PAUSE}“As a man with promise and future,
I don't have any time to fool around
like the rest of you.”

“Ugh…My eyes are tired…
No, I've got
to really buckle down!”{PAUSE}“At least until I become SOLDIER First Class.”

“Most of my rivals died
in the attack on Weapon.”{PAUSE}“Oh, of course, I was here, studying.”{PAUSE}“That coveted green officer's uniform
is almost in my reach.”

“Then I'll be on the newspapers as a
plain clothed First Class officer
in SOLDIER…”{PAUSE}“Then make a triumphant return to my homeland!!
Tons of fan letters…
My future's peachy!”
